item.title: Differentiable Sphere Tracing
item.description: CVPR'20の論文を眺めていたら，最近ハマっているGLSLと関連する面白そうな論文を見つけた． Differentiable Volumetric Rendering: Learning Implicit 3D Representations without 3D Supervision [Niemeyer et al., CVPR'20] DIST: Rendering Deep Implicit Signed Distance Function with
